Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Screens

Class WinScreen

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Screens.WinScreen
public class WinScreen extends Object
WinScreen class displays win screen when player defeated the game.

    • WinScreen

      public WinScreen(javafx.stage.Stage stage, ImgAssetLoader assetLoader, ComponentsFactory componentsFactory, LevelParent levelParent, Controller controller)
      Constructs new WinScreen instance.
      Parameters:
      stage - : primary stage where win screen will be displayed.
      assetLoader - : ImgAssetLoader which responsible for loading images.
      componentsFactory - : ComponentsFactory used for UI components creation.
      levelParent - : LevelParent object.
      controller - : controller which manages the game flow.
